text: hananim-eun najgwa bam-eul yejeung-uipyojeog-eulo hayeo bam-ui pyojeog-eun eodub ge hago naj-ui pyojeog-eun balg-ge hayeossnini ineun neohuiga junim-eulobuteo eun hyeleul guhadolog ham-iyeo ttohan haes-su ui gyesangwa sem-ui hagmun-eul al su iss ge hayeossnola icheoleom hananim-eun geu ege modeun geos-eul seolmyeonghayeossnola
